it.polimi.deib.newdem.adrenaline.controller.actions.atoms

Interface AtomicAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomBase, AtomContext, GrabAtom, MoveAtom, PowerUpAtom, ReloadAtom, RevengeAtom, ShootAtom

    public interface AtomicAction
    Building block of Action, combinable with others in a complete Action
